name: I Watch Seriez
tagline: I Watch Seriez is a file browser to help you keep track of your progress, and much more!
body:
### Download link:
![Download](https://cdn1.iconfinder.com/data/icons/humano2/128x128/actions/system-log-out.png)
Latest installer is always available here: [https://github.com/csomakk/IWatchSeriez/raw/master/install/IWatchSeriez.exe](https://github.com/csomakk/IWatchSeriez/raw/master/install/IWatchSeriez.exe)

I'd prefer the AIR version, which is available here: [https://github.com/csomakk/IWatchSeriez/raw/master/install/IWatchSeriez.air](https://github.com/csomakk/IWatchSeriez/raw/master/install/IWatchSeriez.air) and this needs the Adobe AIR runtime available here: [https://get.adobe.com/air/](https://get.adobe.com/air/) 

### Screenshot:
![Screenshot](https://raw.github.com/csomakk/IWatchSeriez/master/screenshots/v003.PNG)

![Screenshot](https://raw.github.com/csomakk/IWatchSeriez/master/screenshots/v007.PNG)

![Screenshot](https://raw.github.com/csomakk/IWatchSeriez/master/screenshots/v008.PNG)

### Features:
- mark files
- automatically mark launched files
- multiple tabs
- next and last episode of a seriez
- imdb rating
- hotkeys

### Tips: 
Use 'N' keyboard shortcut to mark watched, and start playing next video

### Help me!

Please add any issue you find, and feel free to comment on [Github](https://github.com/csomakk/IWatchSeriez), or in email at csomakk@gmail.com

### FOR DEVS:

I Watch Seriez is written in Adobe/Apache Flex 4.6.0. I personally use IntelliJIdea12 Ultimate as an IDE, I've included the project settings in this repo. Anybody is free to add anything, or contact me with questions at csomakk@gmail.com

Also, feel free to visit my blog at [http://codingmetaphors.com/](http://codingmetaphors.com/)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
